member.name: T:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker
member.summary: Takes the time which a test needs

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker.Begin(System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and starts tracking the time.

member.name: P:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets the elapsed time.

member.name: M:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker.End(System.String)
member.summary: Ends the current execution time tracking and throws an exception if applicable
member.param: the message for the exception or the trace message.

member.name: M:AIT.VisualStudio.TestTools.Common.TimeTaker.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
